headline: Dominion Energy Charitable Foundation Spring Grant Cycle Now Open
summary: RICHMOND, Va., January 20, 2026--Nonprofit organizations within Dominion Energy's service areas are invited to apply for grants from the Dominion Energy Charitable Foundation.
